thread.title: Donald Trump says these terror attacks weren't reported in the media - here's proof that they were

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Donald Trump says these terror attacks weren't reported in the media - here's proof that they were
text:
Donald Trump says these terror attacks weren't reported in the media - here's proof that they were The White House produced a list of 78 terror attacks since 2014 which "did not receive adequate attention from Western media sources"   Share   Comments By Steve Robson 04:41, 7 FEB 2017 Updated 04:52, 7 FEB 2017 News Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Donald Trump BANNED from speaking in Parliament's Watch this video again Watch Next Man's selfie video and text messages convince jud 0:56 Japan's annual snow festival kicks off showcasing 0:38 VoteVets take the fight to President Trump with s 0:30 Marine Le Pen cites Brexit and Trump as she kicks 1:11 Donald Trump meets marching band ahead of Super B 1:18 Sean Spicer's Aussie gaffe! 0:35 Malcolm Turnbull addresses THAT phone call with T 1:50 Trump puts Iran on notice over ballistic missile 1:11 Trump picks conservative judge Gorsuch for the Su 1:33 Tributes paid to fired Attorney General in US Sen 0:52 Video will play in  Donald Trump attacks the press over 'lack of ISIS coverage' Share this video Watch Next   Share   Comments Get politics   Donald Trump has accused the Western media of not reporting on terror attacks in Europe.
Speaking to a group of about 300 US troops in Florida, the President said: "All over Europe, it's happening.
"It's gotten to a point where it's not even being reported.
"And, in many cases, the very, very dishonest press doesn't want to report it.
"They have their reasons, and you understand that."
Trump did not give examples of the terror attacks he believes have not been reported, or any reason as to why they would be purposefully ignored.
US President Donald Trump accused the media of not reporting on terror attacks (Photo: AFP) But the White House later released a list of 78 terror attacks since 2014 which "did not receive adequate attention from Western media sources."
The list includes the appalling attacks in Paris, Brussels and Tunisia which killed hundreds, including Brits, and received blanket news coverage worldwide.
One of the incidents mentioned is the tragic killing of Brit backpackers Mia Ayliffe-Chung and Tom Jackson last year in Queensland, Australia. 
Police investigating the attack have found no links to terrorism.
Frenchman Smail Ayad, 29, has been charged with murder and is being held in a mental health unit.
Here, MirrorOnline addresses each attack, and offers at least one example of our reporting, or reporting by other news organisations considered 'the mainstream media'.
1. Melbourne, Australia 2014 Two police officers wounded in knife attack by Abdul Numan Haider.
Police shoot dead suspected ISIS member after he stabs two counter terrorism officers 
2. Tizi Ouzou, Algeria 2014 Jund al-Khilafah beheads French tourist
Herve Gourdel beheading: Recap updates after ISIS-linked terrorists release video showing execution of French hostage 
3. Quebec, Canada, 2014 One soldier killed and one wounded by Martin Couture-Rouleau
Soldier dies after being mowed down by 'radicalised Islamic militant' 
4. Ottowa, Canada, 2014 One soldier killed at war memorial; two injured at Parliament building
Ottawa shooting: Mother of terrorist who killed soldier ''crying for Canadian people, not for my son'' 
5. New York, USA, 2014 Two police officers wounded in knife attack
Caught on camera: The terrifying moment mad man attacks police with HATCHET before being shot dead 
Fears mad axeman gunned down in NYC when he charged at cops was Islamic terrorist 
6. Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 2014 One Danish citizen wounded in shooting
MailOnline via AFP 
7. Abu Dhabi, UAE, 2014 American killed in knife attack
Abu Dhabi murder: Brits on high alert after American is murdered in possible terror attack 
8. Sydney, Australia, 2014 Two Australians killed in hostage taking
Sydney siege: First pictures of hostages shot dead by fanatic gunman as special forces storm cafe 
Sydney siege: How did the 17-hour standoff come to a bloody end? 
9. Tours, France, 2014 Three police officers wounded in knife attack
French police shoot dead terrorism suspect after he stabbed two officers at police station 
10. Paris, France, 2015 One police officer and four hostages killed in shooting at kosher supermarket
New Paris shooting: First pictures of "dangerous" suspects linked to Charlie Hebdo outrage 
New Paris shooting: Terrified woman inside Jewish supermarket rang daughter to tell her: 'I'm scared, I love you' 
11. Tripoli, Libya, 2015 Ten killed, including one US citizen, in bombing and shooting at hotel frequented by westerners
'ISIS' kill eight in terror and car bomb attack on four star hotel 
12. Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 2015 Two US citizens injured in shooting
BBC 
13. Nice, France, 2015 Two French soldiers injured in knife attack
Nice knife attack: Three soldiers guarding Jewish community centre attacked by knife-wielding man 
14. Copenhagen, Denmark, 2015 One civilian killed at free speech rally and security guard klled outside synagogue
Copenhagen shootings: First pictures of suspected gunman revealed 
Copenhagen shooter: Omar came out of prison wanting to wage holy war says pal 
15. Tunis, Tunisia, 2015 21 tourists killed, including 16 westerners, and 55 wounded in shooting at Bardo Museum
Tunisia museum attack: Sally Adey named as British woman killed in terrorist massacre 
Tunisia museum attack: Brit holidaymakers weep as they tell how they escaped the massacre 
16. Karachi, Pakistan 2015 One US citizen wounded in knife attack
We found no evidence of a stabbing, but the Washington Post and other outlets did report on an American wounded in shooting. 
17. Paris, France, 2015 Catholic churches targeted, one civilian killed in shooting, possibly during an attempted carjacking
French Islamic terrorist suspect's alleged plot foiled after he shot himself in leg 
18. Zvornik, Bosnia, 2015 One officer killed and two wounded in shooting
Daily Mail via Associated Press 
19. Garland, Texas, USA, 2015 One security guard injured in shooting at Prophey Mohammed cartoon event
Garland shooting: ISIS claims responsibility for attack on controversial Muhammad cartoon competition which left two gunmen dead 
20. Boston, USA, 2015 Police officer attacked with knife; no casualties
Dramatic CCTV shows final moments before knife-wielding terror suspect is shot dead by cops 
21. El Gora, Egypt, 2015 No casualties; camp used bu Multinational Force and Observers in shooting and bombing attack
BBC 
22. Luxor, Egypt, 2015 One police officer killed by suicide bomb near the Temple of Karnak
The Telegraph 
23. Sousse, Tunisia, 2015 38 killed and 39 wounded in shooting at a beach frequented by westerners
Tunisia attack: Picture of ISIS gunman Seifiddine Rezgui shows the devastating bomb he planned to set off 
Tunisia terror attack: Repatriation of British victims killed in beach massacre begins 
24. Lyon, France, 2015 One civilian killed in explosion and beheading at chemical plant
Yassin Sahli: Who is 'ISIS' Grenoble beheading terror suspect? 
25. Cairo, Egypt, 2015 One killed and nine wounded in VBIED at Italian Consulate
Egypt Italian consulate bombing: At least one dead in blast amid fears of ISIS attack on popular holiday destination 
26. Cairo, Egypt, 2015 One Croatian national kidnapped, beheaded on August 12 at unknown location
Croatian hostage held by ISIS has been beheaded, according to sickening image released by jihadis 
27. Paris, France, 2015 Two civilians and one US soldier wounded with firearms and knife on passenger train
French train shooting: Gunman in bare feet with bandaged eyes in court appearance 
28. El Gora, Egypt, 2015 Four US and two MFO troops wounded in IED attack
CBS News 
29. Dhaka, Bangladesh, 2015 One Italian civilian killed in shooting
The Guardian 
30. Copenhagen, Denmark, 2015 One police officer wounded in knife attack
The Telegraph 
31. El Gora, Egypt, 2015 No casulaties; airfield used by MFOs attacked by rockets
Reuters 
32. Parramatta, Australia, 2015 One police officer killed in shooting
Parramatta shooting: Lone gunman in black cloak guns down police officer then waits for 'suicide by cop' 
33. Rangpur, Bangladesh, 2015 One Japanese civilian killed in shooting
Reuters 
34. Hasanah, Egypt, 2015 224 killed in downing of Russian airliner
Russian plane crash: Picture shows innocent 15-year-old girl who was sitting on bomb which killed 224 people 
ISIS claim they bombed Russian plane using this Schweppes pineapple drinks can 
35. Merced, California, 2015 Four wounded in knife attack on college campus
CNN 
36. Paris, France, 2015 At least 129 killed, and approx 400 wounded in series of shootings and IED attacks
Paris attacks: Live updates as Francois Hollande declares 'France is at war' and promises more Syria air strikes 
Paris attacks Bataclan gunman 'rejected by army and police after failing tests' 
37. Dinajpur, Bangladesh, 2015 One Italian citizen wounded in shooting
BBC 
38. Rajlovac, Bosnia, 2015 Two Bosnian soldiers killed in shooting
Reuters 
39. San Bernadino, California, 2015 14 killed and 21 wounded in coordinated firearms attack
San Bernardino shooter 'pledged allegiance to ISIS' before murdering 14 people 
Islamic State claim responsibility for California shootings that killed 14 people 
40. London, 2015 Three wounded in knife attack at underground station
Leytonstone stabbing trial: Dramatic footage shows police Tasering man three times after he 'slashed commuter's throat' 
Leytonstone Tube stabbing: Dramatic new first person footage shows true terror of ISIS fanatic's knife rampage through station 
41. Derbent, Russia, 2015 One killed and 11 wounded in shooting at UN World Heritage site
The Independent 
42. Cairo, Egypt, 2016 Two injured in drive-by shooting outside a hotel frequented by tourists
Cairo hotel tourist bus shooting: Gunmen open fire on coach in Egyptian city 
43. Paris, France, 2016 Attacker killed after attempted knife attack on Paris police station
First picture of ISIS terrorist shot dead in Paris as he stormed a police station 
44. Philadelphia, USA, 2016 One police officer wounded in shooting
Philadelphia ISIS shooting: Video shows horrifying events as gunman opens fire on cop in patrol car 
45. Hurghada, Egypt, 2016 One German and one Danish international wounded in knife attack at a tourist resort
Egypt hotel shooting: Video shows aftermath of gun attack by 'ISIS fighters waving black flags' 
Hurghada hotel attack: Tourist slashed four times in neck by ISIS knifeman says he was 'lucky' to survive 
46. Marseille, France, 2016 One Jewish teacher wounded in machete attack
Jewish man attacked by machete-wielding boy shouting 'Allah hu akbar' outside Marseille synagogue 
47. Istanbul, Turkey, 2016 12 German tourists killed and 15 wounded in suicide bombing
First CCTV of 'ISIS suicide bomber' days before he blew himself up killing 10 tourists in Istanbul 
Istanbul suicide bomber Nabil Fadli pictured as family says they are 'ashamed' of killer 
48. Jakarta, Indonesia, 2016 Four civilians killed and more than 20 wounded in coordinating bombing and firearms attacks near a police station and Starbucks
Jakarta terror attack: ISIS suicide bombers captured detonating explosive vest outside Starbucks in horrific footage 
49. Columbus, USA, 2016 Four civilians wounded in knife attack at restaurant
MailOnline 
50. Hanover, Germany, 2016 One police officer wounded in knife attack
German teen who knifed cop in the neck was reportedly told to 'surprise the unbelievers' by ISIS 
51. Istanbul, Turkey, 2016 Four killed and 36 wounded in suicide bombing in the tourist district
Istanbul suicide bomber who killed 4 people and injured 36 identified as ISIS fighter 
52. Brussels, Belgium, 2016 At least 31 killed and 270 wounded in coordinated bombings at Zaventem airprt and subway
Who were Brussels suicide bomber brothers? 'Well-known' criminals managed to dodge bungling cops for TEN days before attack 
Brussels attacks: The Queen and Prince Philip 'deeply shocked and saddened' over terror atrocities and offer 'sincere condolences' 
53. Essen, Germany, 2016 Three wounded in bombing at Sikh temple
The Independent 
54. Orlando, USA, 2016 49 killed and 53 wounded in shooting at nightclub
Orlando killer Omar Mateen's ex-wife describes how 'ISIS sympathiser' mass killer husband beat her for not doing washing 
Orlando shooting investigators haunted by sound of mobile phones as families try to ring victims 
55. Magnanville, France, 2016 One civilian and one police officer killed in knife attack
First picture of ISIS killer Larossi Abballa who stabbed French police officer and his wife to death 
56. Kabul, Afghanistan, 2016 14 killed on suicide attack on a bus carrying Canadian Embassy guards
New York Times 
57. Istanbul, Turkey, 2016 45 killed and approx. 240 wounded at Ataturk International Airport
Chilling moment suicide terror gang took over Istanbul’s Ataturk Airport terminal 
Horrifying CCTV shows terrorist's cold-blooded shooting of Istanbul airport cop who confronted him before attack 
58. Dhaka, Bangladesh, 2016 22 killed including one American, and 50 wounded after hours-long siege using machetes and firearms at holy Artisan Bakery
Dhaka terror attack victim's chilling final call to her father: 'They're killing everyone here' 
59. Nice, France, 2016 84 civilians killed and 308 wounded by an individual who drove a truck into a crowd
Pictured: Inside Nice terrorist Mohamed Lahouaiej Bouhlel's lair which may reveal clues about reasons behind lorry attack 

Nice terror attack death toll reaches 85 after dad on life support passes away 
60. Wurzburg, Germany, 2016 Four civilians wounded in axe attack on a train 

Germany train axe attack: Afghan teenage refugee shouting 'Allahu Akbar' goes on bloody rampage hacking passengers 
61. Ansbach, Germany, 2016 At least 15 wounded in suicide bombing at a music festival 

Ansbach suicide bomber who killed himself and injured 12 was Syrian refugee who had been denied asylum 
62. Normandy, France, 2016 One priest killed in knife attack
Two ISIS knifemen shouting 'Allahu Akbar' slit French priest's throat in church attack taking nuns and worshippers hostage 
63. Charleroi, Belgium, 2016 Two police officers wounded in machete attack
Belgium police machete attack: ISIS claim responsibility after knifeman shouting 'Allahu Akbar' hacks two female officers in face 
64. Queensland, Australia, 2016* Two killed and one wounded in knife attack at a hostel frequented by Westerners 

'Our brave boy died a hero,' say parents of backpacker who tried to save girl stabbed at Australian hostel 
*Police have found no links to terrorism in this attack 
65. Copenhagen, Denmark, 2016 Two police officers and a civilian wounded in shooting 
Copenhagen residents bulldoze notorious 'Pusher Street' market after police shootings linked to drugs trade 


66. Paris, France, 2016 One police officer wounded in raid after VBIED failed to detonate at Notre Dame Cathedral 
Female 'ISIS terrorist cell wanted to blow up Eiffel Tower' as mum-of-three charged 
67. Sydney, Australia, 2016 One civilian wounded in knife attack
'ISIS-inspired' Australian charged with terrorism after man stabbed walking through park 
68. St Cloud, USA, 2016 10 wounded in knife attack in a mall
Minnesota shopping centre stabbing: Knifeman 'referencing Allah' shot dead after injuring 8 in horrifying rampage 
69. New York and New Jersey, USA, 2016 31 wounded in bombing in New York City; several explosive devices found in New York and New Jersey; one exploded without casualty at race in New Jersey; one police officer wounded in shootout
New York bombing suspect shootout with police caught on camera as terrified residents flee gunfire 
Accused New York bomber pleads not guilty from hospital bed via video link 
70. Brussels, Belgium, 2016 Two police officers wounded in stabbing
Brussels stabbing: Two police officers knifed and suspect shot in horrifying attack 71. Kuwait City, Kuwait, 2016 No casualties; vehicle carrying three US soldiers hit by a truck 

CBS News 
72. Malmo, Sweden, 2016 No casualties; mosque and community center attacked with Molotov cocktail 

The Local, Sweden 
73. Hamburg, Germany, 2016 One killed in knife attack
The Telegraph 
74. Manila, Philippines, 2016 No casualties; failed IED attempt near US Embassy 

CNN 
75. Columbus, USA, 2016 14 wounded by individuals who drove a vehicle into a group of pedestrians and attacked them with a knife 

Ohio State University attack: 9 wounded in "car and machete" rampage as police kill "active shooter" 
ISIS claims Ohio State University attacker Abdul Razak Ali Artan is 'soldier of Islamic State' 
76. N'djamena, Chad, 2016 No casualties; attacker arrested after opening fire at entrance of US Embassy
Africa News via AFP 
77. Karak, Jordan, 2016 10 killed and 28 wounded in shooting at a tourist site 

The Guardian 
78. Berlin, Germany, 2016 12 killed and 48 wounded by individual who drove truck into a crowded market
Berlin terror attack doctors say 'nothing could prepare them for the horror' 
Berlin truck attacker sent sick ‘selfie’ behind wheel to fellow jihadis moments before ploughing HGV into Christmas market
